name: Garden of coloured lights
content:
files:
- game: http://netix.dl.sourceforge.net/project/garden/garden/1.0.8/garden-1.0.8-RC.exe
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/garden/garden.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    key: winemenubuilder.exe
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DllOverrides
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: ''
- task:
    args: /S
    description: Installing...
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: sandbox
    description: Disabling unused WINE features
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: vd=640x480
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
system:
  use_us_layout: true
